```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(0, 5, 1000)
>>> x[0] += 1e-15
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, yvp(1, x, 0), label=r"$Y_1$")
>>> ax.plot(x, yvp(1, x, 1), label=r"$Y_1'$")
>>> ax.plot(x, yvp(1, x, 2), label=r"$Y_1''$")
>>> ax.plot(x, yvp(1, x, 3), label=r"$Y_1'''$")
>>> ax.set_ylim(-10, 10)
>>> plt.legend()
>>> plt.show() 
```
